name: inclusive-menu-button
description: A menu button module that implements the correct ARIA semantics and keyboard behavior.

scripts.extract-version: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
scripts.add-version:
echo "/*! inclusive-menu-button $(npm run extract-version --silent) — © Heydon Pickering */
$(cat inclusive-menu-button.min.js)" > inclusive-menu-button.min.js
scripts.build: npm run uglify && npm run add-version

author: Heydon Pickering
